thread.title: So good I want to keep it a secret
thread.title_full: So good I want to keep it a secret - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Loopytravelling
title: So good I want to keep it a secret
text:
But that's not fair :)
This hotel is amazing, its like stepping back in time to gentler era. The rooms are beautifully furnished, its like staying at Versailles palace, the tiny bar twinkling in the candlelight in the evening is incredibly inviting and again harks back to a time long ago, sitting in the sitting room with a coffee in front of the open fire makes you feel like you are back in your granny's parlour and a million miles from the Paris business mere feet away from you.
The lift is a thing to behold, its got a mind of its own but we discovered a few encouraging words got it moving or was that just for our amusement.
I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough.
Room Tip: Any room at all is truly a joy See more room tips
